entrypoints.name: 1) Canvas Resizing based on browser width... Abe I need help with this dude.
6) HELP: each time you lose the game the snake moves faster
7) Same problem as #6, but the game responds to f key for speed now
9) HELP: Can't get the spacebar to actually pause the game
10) HELP: wanted to make the snake longer with O key press, but instead O clears the canvas
11) F = faster! (all previous key event problems have been resolved)

12) The canvas color is now a CSS element... which broke the tail erasure of the snake... which is pretty cool. (also the food stays on the page each time. I think taking the color away also removed the erase canvas at restart part)

13) I changed the things that I removed in itteration 12, and it made the stroke color the background color, which I like better, but now the score is gone and the background-color is still not an html element
14) More color changes... Now the SHIFT key changes the background to match the canvas again...
